recipe.title: Kale with Pomegranate Dressing and Ricotta Salata
ingredients: 1 bunch red Russian or purple kale or 2 bunches Tuscan kale, ribs and stems removed, leaves torn into 2" pieces
instructions: Combine shallot, vinegar, and pomegranate molasses in a large bowl; season dressing with salt and pepper and let sit 5 minutes.
Add kale to dressing, season with salt and pepper, and massage dressing into leaves. Add pomegranate seeds and oil and toss to combine. Serve topped with ricotta salata.
Do ahead: Dressing can be made 4 hours ahead; cover and chill.
